subject: HSBC Building968 Rama IV Rd,
body:
HSBC Building968 Rama IV Rd,
Silom Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500,
Thailand.Contact Person: Williams Bruce
Tel:  +66 2 614 4032
Beneficiary ,
RE: OVERDUE PAYMENT
We, the entire members of the World Bank/Audit Department of the Ministry
of finance Thailand, on behalf of the resolution panel on contract payment,
inheritance claims and lottery winnings, a meeting was held on the 23rd of
March, 2023, concerning release withheld and overdue payments to you, both
foreign and local contractors, inheritance claims and lottery winnings.
Going through files today, we discovered that your file was dumped
untreated or you have been dealing with the impostors in Western
African/Europeans in regards to your claims, at this juncture, we apologize
for the delay of your payment and please stop communicating with any office
or individuals from West Africans/Europeans prior to this new development
forthwith.
Your attention should be focused to the appointed office below for you to
receive your funds.
Now you're new Payment Reference No.-3094, Password No: 003, Pin Code
No:10899 and youâ€™re Certificate of Merit Payment No: 20323, Release code No:
202344 Immediate Telex Confirmation No: 7493.
Having received these vital payment numbers, therefore you are now
qualified to receive your funds Transfer immediately within 24 hrs via Hsbc
Bank Plc Atm master Card without any hindrances and we advise you to keep
your vital payment numbers confidential to avoid any double claimants.
Note that the sum of US$10,500,000.00(TEN MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND
UNITED STATES DOLLARS ONLY) would be issued in an atm master card and
delivered to your doorsteps through our affiliated courier delivery
services (Ups Courier Company) within 24hrs without any hitches.
We advise you to contact us with the requested information shows below for
more details on how to release your overdue payment which still remains
unclaimed to you.

Address:

Note: That we have all the vital documents that will back up this

Your anticipated response is highly appreciated.
Thank you for banking with us,

Williams Bruce
Legal Advisor
~^
Important confidentiality Notice: This electronic message and any
attachments are confidential and may be protected by legal privilege. If
you are not an intended recipient, be Aware that any disclosure, copying,
distribution, or use of this Message or any attachments is prohibited. If
you have received this message in error, please notify us immediately or

subject: Re:  HSBC Building968 Rama IV Rd,
body:
Dear Williams Bruce,

I am writing in response to your email regarding the release of withheld and overdue payments. I appreciate your efforts in resolving this matter.

However, I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed. Could you please provide more details about these claims? Specifically, I would like to know the origin of these funds and why they were initially withheld.

Also, could you please explain the process for receiving these funds via an ATM MasterCard? 

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: HSBC Building968 Rama IV Rd,
body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you so much for your prompt response. The message we sent to you is
about your Lottery Payment which was withheld because of documentation.

We are to inform you that this bank handles everything concerning the
documents that will grant you a successful delivery of your ATM MASTER CARD.

These funds the sum of US$10.5 Million US Dollars would be issued via atm
master card and delivered to your country of origin as soon as we are able
to receive the proper information from you.

We need your House Address/Office Address. Mobile Number/Full Name for
documentation.

With this information the delivery company will accept to deliver the atm
card to you.

We are expecting to hear from you so by next week the atm card will be in
your hands.
Best Regards,
Williams Bruce
